      • addChoiceIfAbsent

        public boolean addChoiceIfAbsent(java.lang.String displayName,
                        java.lang.Object value)
        Add choice if it is not yet available. Checks both value and display name.
        Parameters:
        displayName - display name to add, if not yet available
        value - value to add, if not yet available
        Returns:
        true, if the choice was added, false if not because it was already available

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        choice or null, if not available

      • findChoice

        public com.fluidops.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> findChoice(java.lang.String displayName,
                                                                   java.lang.Object value)
        Find existing choice. Returns first existing choice if either display name or value match.
        Parameters:
        displayName - name to look for or null to ignore
        value - value to look for or null to ignore (checked using Object.equals(Object)
        Returns:
        choice or null, if not available
